appointments.title: FW: Invitation to Discuss CRM Project Plan
appointments.description:
From: devasish.banerjee@tcgls.com
When: 5:30 PM - 6:45 PM 11 December 2024
Subject: FW: Invitation to Discuss CRM Project Plan
Location: Microsoft Teams Meeting


Please attend this session.

From: devasish.banerjee@tcgls.com
When: 5:30 PM - 6:45 PM 11 December 2024
Subject: Invitation to Discuss CRM Project Plan
Location: Microsoft Teams Meeting


Agenda:
1. Overview of the CRM Project Plan – Brief walkthrough of the project objectives, timelines, and key deliverables.
2. Role of Stakeholders – Discussion on your contributions and expectations during the CRM engagement.
3. Opportunity Funnel Management – Collaborative brainstorming on:
• The stages an opportunity should progress through.
• Key criteria for transitioning opportunities across these stages.



________________________________________________________________________________
Microsoft Teams Need help?<https://aka.ms/JoinTeamsMeeting?omkt=en-US>
Join the meeting now<https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_MjMyMjgxMWItOTBjMC00OTE3LWJkM2UtYWY5NTRmM2Q1ZGVm%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%22d7c7dc8a-8952-462b-85ad-bd10cc8bbb5a%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%22cd7f27ae-ce6d-4a40-b6be-1a68f9c998b0%22%7d>

From: Vijay Kumar G M <vijaygm@brigadegroup.com<mailto:vijaygm@brigadegroup.com>>
Sent: Monday, December 9, 2024 4:54 PM
To: Roehan R <Roehan@kambaa.in<mailto:Roehan@kambaa.in>>; Jagan S <jagan@kambaa.in<mailto:jagan@kambaa.in>>
Cc: Goutam Roy <goutamroy@brigadegroup.com<mailto:goutamroy@brigadegroup.com>>
Subject: RE: Next Steps After Our Bangalore Meeting | Kambaa <> Brigade Group


Hi Jagan,



Following the below email, we will connect on Wednesday, 11th December 2024 at 11 AM. Please confirm.



Thanks and Regards,

Vijay Kumar G M | IT & Systems



From: Roehan R <Roehan@kambaa.in<mailto:Roehan@kambaa.in>>
Sent: 19 November 2024 14:58
To: Goutam Roy <goutamroy@brigadegroup.com<mailto:goutamroy@brigadegroup.com>>
Cc: Vijay Kumar G M <vijaygm@brigadegroup.com<mailto:vijaygm@brigadegroup.com>>; Jagan S <jagan@kambaa.in<mailto:jagan@kambaa.in>>
Subject: Next Steps After Our Bangalore Meeting | Kambaa <> Brigade Group



CAUTION: Please do not open attachments or links in this message from an External source, unless you are sure of their contents.

________________________________

Hi Goutam,

It was a pleasure meeting you recently to discuss how Freshservice is operating at Brigade Group. We understand the challenges and are committed to helping optimize your ITSM tooling. Our team has completed a thorough analysis and submitted our recommendations on Monday, and we hope they address the pain points effectively.

We were equally excited to dive into the larger strategic imperatives at Brigade Group—your vision for using AI and the organization-wide Freshservice implementation is impressive. It’s clear there’s immense potential for impactful solutions ahead.

To take this further, we’d love to organize a quick 1-hour workshop with you and your team. We believe it’ll help uncover additional opportunities and tailor solutions to your goals. Let us know a time that works for you!

Warm Regards,

Roehan,
Senior Consultant,
Kambaa Inc.
M - 7094480111.
